Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma retired hurt after being hit on the shoulder
Rishabh Pant was hit on the elbow, arm, chest and glove
Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets in the 10th over
Josh Little was run out trying to ensure that Delany has strike for the next over
Curtis Campher hit a six over square leg
Gareth Delany hooked Pandya into the crowd for six
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and chose to bowl
The pitch was described as challenging and offering a lot of movement
India’s quick bowlers performed exceptionally well
Ireland’s top order collapsed early in the chase
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's resilience after the match
The coach highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was described as 'challenging' and 'unusual'
The weather was overcast, but manageable for the match
The match was expected to be a close game between the two rival teams
